text: A lender shall not charge and retain fees paid by the borrower in making a covered loan which are:
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 210 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-132, see notes following § 26-1151.01.

DC CODE § 26-1152.10

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: For services that are not actually performed;
For loan discount points which are not bona fide discount points; or
In violation of the Real Estate Procedures Settlement Act of 1974, approved December 22, 1974 (88 Stat. 1724; 12 U.S.C. § 2601 et seq.).

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)
